title: Info class scope error - explain compile error

content.question: Which of the following best explains why the class will not compile?

choices.label: The class is missing an accessor method.
The instance variables  name  and  number  should be designated  public  instead of  private.
The return type for the  Info  constructor is missing.
The variable  num  is not defined in the  addNum  method.

content.answer: The variable  num  is not defined in the  addNum  method.

skill.text: 3.D: Explain why a code segment will not compile or work as intended and modify the code to correct the error.
